docs.lead_paragraph: The adult industry’s medical consultants say that about 350,000 sex scenes have been shot without condoms since 2004, and H.I.V. has not been transmitted on a set once.

headline.seo: Unlikely Model for H.I.V. Prevention: Adult Film Industry
headline.main: Unlikely Model in H.I.V. Efforts: Sex Film Industry
headline.print_headline: Unlikely Model in H.I.V. Efforts: Sex Film Industry

docs.abstract: Adult film industry has maintained an extremely low rate of sexual disease transmission through a regimen of regular testing of actors and set inspections, with no transmissions of HIV since 2004; experts say results are surprising given how much high-risk sex takes place on set.
docs.snippet: The adult industry’s medical consultants say that about 350,000 sex scenes have been shot without condoms since 2004, and H.I.V. has not been transmitted on a set once.

docs.lead_paragraph: The work of state and federal epidemiologists in identifying an outbreak of fungal meningitis and tying it to a tainted steroid highlights many of the strengths of government health agencies.

headline.seo: Doctors Chased Clues to Identify Meningitis Outbreak

docs.abstract: Work of state and federal epidemiologists in identifying an outbreak of fungal meningitis that was one of the most serious in American medical history, and tying it to the source of a tainted steroid, highlights many of the strengths of government health agencies.
docs.snippet: The work of state and federal epidemiologists in identifying an outbreak of fungal meningitis and tying it to a tainted steroid highlights many of the strengths of government health agencies.

docs.lead_paragraph: The funding, which comes from both public and private sources, will help universities work with companies, hospitals and NGOs on medical and scientific research.

headline.main: More Than £1 Billion Goes to U.K. Research
headline.print_headline: More Than £1 Billion Goes to U.K. Research

docs.snippet: The funding, which comes from both public and private sources, will help universities work with companies, hospitals and NGOs on medical and scientific research.

docs.lead_paragraph: Anyone thinking of vet school should consider the financial strain as well as the job satisfaction. Average debt: $125,000.

headline.kicker: So You Want to Be a ... Vet
headline.content_kicker: So You Want to Be a ... Vet

docs.abstract: Graduates of veterinary schools carry an average debt of $125,000; students considering applying to veterinary programs should balance likelihood of high job satisfaction against probability of financial strain.
docs.snippet: Anyone thinking of vet school should consider the financial strain as well as the job satisfaction. Average debt: $125,000.

docs.lead_paragraph: A ban on financial transactions with Iran has inadvertently affected critical supplies that are exempted from Western sanctions.

headline.seo: Iran Sanctions Take Toll on Medical Imports
headline.main: Iran Sanctions Take Unexpected Toll on Medical Imports
headline.print_headline: Iran Sanctions Take Unexpected Toll on Medical Imports

docs.abstract: Ban on financial transactions with Iran has inadvertently affected imports of critical medical supplies that are exempted from Western sanctions.
docs.snippet: A ban on financial transactions with Iran has inadvertently affected critical supplies that are exempted from Western sanctions.
